WorkItem.Description:
So I downloaded the new Rawr for today's 4.2 update and when I use the addon to upload my information (this also happens with the Battle.net method as well) it's showing just really low numbers for DPS for all items, no survivability and items in very odd orders.
Â 
A screenshot is attached for reference.

Comments.Message: To be more specific, this seems to be a strictly DPSWarr.Fury model issue. Both DPSWarr.Arms (Makkah on Akama) and Retribution Pally Bristef on Akama) models seem to be working OK. My own toon (Turambar on Akama) shows all items as 0 DPS until I select the highest valued Off-Hand enchant (Avalanche not Landslide?) then it will reflect most DPS values. However, enchants, reforging and gems are still highly skewed (Sta/Hit gems valued higher than straight Str?) Also note that this issue applies to both the EJ SL version as well as the downloadable WPF one.

Same issue with the cat. The 372 T11 is the BiS Oo

Bear seems to work fine.
I can replicate just not sure where to start looking.
Check your options pane, it may not be selecting the Fury attacks (Bloodthirst, Whirlwind, etc) or you set the fight duration on the boss tab to like or something. Please attach your file.
I didn't adjust anything in the settings and it's showing this information.  I also loaded my alts and they are working just fine.  I attached my character file.
Furry is not working at all for me, It recomends very strange things, like hast and hit before STR

@ JustKikinIt: (Assuming your toon is Sliver) I was able to open your toon and when I deselect the Rend option in the rotation, your overall DPS jumped from just under 600 DPS to about 15.5K DPS so you should be able to resolve your issue by cleaning up the rotation page. (Verified that enchants changed from Avalanche to Landslide as BiS enchantt so should be good to go).
Unfortunately my toon (Turambar@Akama) already had Rend deselected (as well as the other "Arms" abilities) so this "trick" didn't work for me. Attaching file and here are a few observations: by selecting the recommanded BiS enchant (Avalanche?), I go from 0 DPS to a few hundred and by selecting T11 10N Average Boss the Survivability scale starts showing numbers but I still haven't been able to find the root DPS issue cause.
Having the same problem.  I tried changing the ability options as suggested.  No change

DPSWarr.Fury. Heimdallur@Vek'nilash.  0 stats everywhere. Both SL and web versions. Issue noticed since patch 4.2 came out.
Thanks.

@ Brituck  This method of un-checking Rend WAS working...however, I respec'd tonight to tweak my DPS a little more and now it's no longer working.  Even with Rend unchecked I'm still getting the very low DPS amounts shown.  I've attached an updated file.

Same issue here as with doodoodle - all items are rated zero on both the website and the downloadable.  I've reset the cache and only downloaded the DL version after encountering this issue.  Character file attached.
Just noticed the files aren't linked to the comments - my warrior's file is Khorgan-Dalaran-Rawr.

Now my enhance shaman seems to be having a similar but different issue.  His gear has ratings assigned, but there are no priorities given for combat rotation, and no options to enable any.  Ergo, Rawr is only calculating auto-attack damage for him.  I've attached his character file (Khordon-Dalaran.xml).
